verbose_text: K-Rta binds directly to C/EBPalpha in vitro and in vivo, and deletion of aa 151-167 of K-Rta inhibits (1) the interaction of K-Rta with C/EBPalpha or PAN DNA, (2) transactivation of the PAN promoter by Rta alone, and (3) cooperative transactivation of the K-bZIP or PAN promoters by Rta with C/EBPalpha ChIPs demonstrated that C/EBPalpha and Rta bound to the Rta, PAN, and Mta promoters in increasing amounts at 8 and 24 h after TPA addition to PEL cells, but not in un treated cells.
evidence: interaction of K-Rta with C/EBPalpha or PAN DNA
